page.title: 09CHILDRENS HOBBIES -GIRLS
page.content: These include music,football, fishing, B.M.X.racing,reading ,camping, sports, drama,bird-watching, collecting World War 2 equipment and collecting rubbers My name is Caroline Bentham.My hobby is Athletics Club on 2 nights a week.I have been going for 2 years I run in the 800m,200m and 100m. My name is Claire Parkinson.My hobby is dancing,I attend the Ridgeway School of Dancing.I have won 169 medals for singing,tap,modern dance, character,national,productions,groups, trios and duets.I have won 2 trophies and 2 talent contests. My name is Rachel Smith.I go to the same dancing school as Claire. I have won over 180 medals and 7 trophies. My name is Kirsty Pagdin.I collect rubbers. I have over 200 and they are all different.I keep them in my bedroom.
